topic.title: Maximizing card views

section.title: Introduction
section.p: By viewing a card view in the maximized mode you will see only the information you care about (i.e. your cards) and remove other actions from the top of the screen when they are not needed. This will allow for cleaner, more useful views when working with your Mingle cards.

section.title: How to maximize a card view?

topic.section: In any card view select the "Maximize view" link to maximize the view. In order to return to the non-maximized view use the "Restore view".
Maximized views can also be saved as favorites.
